checkDevices: Check your device settings before you join the meeting

desktop.allowDevice: Please allow access to your microphone and camera.
desktop.allowChrome: Allow Chrome to use your microphone.
desktop.allowChromeDescription: In System Settings, open 'Privacy & security' and allow Chrome access to your microphone and camera
desktop.notFoundDevice: Check your system settings to make sure that a camera is available. If not, plug one in. You might then need to restart your browser.
desktop.errorDevice: There was an error accessing the media devices. Please reset your microphone and camera to join the meeting.
desktop.noDevice: Will you be joining the meeting without a microphone and camera?

allowAccess.mobile: Reload & Allow Access to Mic & Cam

preview.invitedText: invited you to this special scene

meetingNotStarted.title:
Meeting has not 
started yet
meetingNotStarted.text: Please wait for the host arrival

enterPermission: You need a permission from the participant to join
kicked: You have been removed from the meeting

endMeeting.hint:
When you Leave callers can still look around and
send payments

cancelChanges.title: Cancel changes?
cancelChanges.text: If you leave now all the changes be lost

becomeParticipant.title: Become a Participant
becomeParticipant.text: The Host is inviting you to be seen & heard by all

features.tooltipParticipantInMeeting: Once saved, Participants can send you this fee by clicking the dollar icon [$] on the bottom right
features.tooltipAudienceInMeeting: Once saved, Audience can send you this fee by clicking the dollar icon [$] on the bottom right
features.tooltipParticipantPaywall: Once saved, Participants members will be prompted to pay this fee to join meeting
features.tooltipAudiencePaywall: Once saved, Audience members will be prompted to pay this fee to join meeting

portraitLayout.text: Please turn horizontally for an awesome call.

expired.title: Meeting was canceled
expired.text:
Host run out of meeting minutes. Contact them
to resolve the issues.

hostDeleted.title: Meeting was finished
hostDeleted.text: The meeting has been finished as the host's account was deleted by Ruume admin. Sorry for inconvenience

role.tooltipParticipant: Invite up to 9 more Participants. They can be seen and heard by all.
role.tooltipLurker: Invite up to 1000 Audience members. They view & hear Participants.

disablePublicMeeting: Register to invite up to 1000 callers in the Audience.
